quest.name: A Dirty Trick
journal:
 Quest Sync
Szel Guanleu looks at you. And you look at him. And he looks at you. And you look at him. You should probably ask what he wants.
objectives: Deliver the pungent sack to Astrille.
Deliver the bag of feed vegetables to Szel Guanleu.

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: That you have come here, and gaze at me with such bright and eager eyes... It can only mean one thing. You, you madamsir, are an aspiring breeder!

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: No need to be embarrassed! It is perfectly natural to take an interest in the mating habits of livestock. But those secrets are not for the uninitiated, I'm afraid! You will need to start with the basics─and that means cleaning the stables!

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: Come now─you cannot balk at getting your hands dirty if you are to be a proper livestock breeder!

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: That's the spirit! Now, take this pungent sack! It's for Astrille over in Sweetsieve.

dialogue.name: ASTRILLE
dialogue.text: Hello there! Has anyone ever told you that you smell of fertilizer?

dialogue.name: ASTRILLE
dialogue.text: Ah, that explains that, then. Thank you! Without such rich fertilizer as this, we'd never be able to grow the quantity of vegetables that we do.

dialogue.name: ASTRILLE
dialogue.text: I usually provide Szel Guanleu with produce in return... Would you mind taking it to him?

dialogue.name: ASTRILLE
dialogue.text: Hopefully the bag isn't too heavy. It's full of root vegetables and the like for the animals, and they do eat quite a bit...

dialogue.name: ASTRILLE
dialogue.text: I hope you don't feel too put-upon by my asking you to deliver the vegetables for me...though I'd wager that you're mainly relieved it's not more dung.

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: And you brought me vegetables! My, you are helplessly industrious, aren't you?

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: At this point, I should probably confess that I never actually mistook you for an aspiring breeder. I was joking! But to my complete shock, you did what I asked. So then I thought to myself, surely she'llhe'll catch on if I try to hand over a literal sack of shite, but...

dialogue.name: SZELGUANLEU
dialogue.text: The point is, I got carried away. I apologize. Please, take this as payment for your efforts.
